description: Build meaningful on-brand scheduling experiences with OnceHubs online appointment booking software

actions.name: createContact
actions.description: Create a new contact in Oncehub. Either email or mobile_phone is required.

actions.name: findContact
actions.description: Search for contacts in Oncehub by various criteria

triggers.name: bookingCanceledThenRescheduled
triggers.description: Triggered when Customer cancels a booking and then reschedules on a different booking page.

triggers.name: bookingCanceled
triggers.description: Triggered when User or Customer cancels a booking

triggers.name: bookingCompleted
triggers.description: Triggered when booking end time has passed.

triggers.name: bookingNoshow
triggers.description: Triggered when User sets the completed booking to No-show

triggers.name: bookingRescheduled
triggers.description: Triggered when Customer reschedules a booking on the same booking page and Customer reschedules a booking following a request from the User to reschedule

triggers.name: bookingScheduled
triggers.description: Triggered when Customer schedules a booking and when User approves a booking requested by a Customer

triggers.name: conversationAbandoned
triggers.description: Triggered when website visitor stops interacting with a bot for more than 10 minutes.

triggers.name: conversationClosed
triggers.description: Triggered when: Website visitor reaches the end of the conversation flow and when Website visitor starts a new conversation with a different chatbot

triggers.name: conversationStarted
triggers.description: Triggered when website visitor starts interacting with a chatbot.
